descriptions.description: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) is a remote display system which allows you to view and interact with a virtual desktop environment that is running on another computer on the network. TigerVNC is a high-speed version of VNC. It bases on RealVNC 4 and X.org code and includes features from the TightVNC and TurboVNC projects. This includes accelerated JPEG compression.
